Description: On I-66 at mile marker 58.4 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 60.6 in the County of Chesterfield, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north left shoulder, left lane, and right shoulder are closed.
